Additional leisure facilities including a table tennis. There is also a children's play area. There is a TV lounge area and a guest computer with internet access. There is a golf course just 1.2 km away. Ericsson Globe and Tele2 Arena are 5 km away from 2Home Stockholm South. Liljeholmen Shopping Centre and Bus Terminal is 3.6 km away. Årstabergs station is a 15-minute walk from the property. Free parking is possible yet limited.

name: Scandic Victoria Tower
address: Arne Beurlings Torg 3 A, 164 40 Kista, Stockholms Lan
description: This modern hotel in Stockholm offers free wireless internet, as well as a sauna and free bicycle rental. It also provides an express check-in and check-out feature, meeting rooms and a 24-hour reception. This stylish hotel offers a laundry service, shops and luggage storage. There is public parking nearby for guests travelling with a car. The luxurious feel of each room at Scandic Victoria Tower is complemented by amenities such as flat-screen TVs. All provide an in-room safe and ironing facilities. Guests are able to relax with a drink at Scandic Victoria Tower's bar and try international style food in the restaurant. For those preferring to dine out, the local area features a number of bars and restaurants with a range of different cuisines. Scandic Victoria Tower is within walking distance of Kista. It is within a 20-minute stroll of Kista Metro Station, which allows for easy access in and around Stockholm.Revato

name: Sky Hotel Apartments Stockholm
description: These modern apartments are only a 10-minute metro ride from Stockholm Central Station. Each has a modern kitchen, TV and free WiFi. All options at Sky Hotel Apartments Stockholm feature a cooker, fridge and microwave. Contemporary décor, a seating area and cable TV channels are standard. Guests can enjoy free access to a shared laundry room. Thorildsplan Metro Station is 4 minutes’ walk away.

name: Best Western Plus Sthlm Bromma
description: Best Western Plus Sthlm Bromma is the first hotel in direct connection with Bromma Stockholm Airport. The proximity to Stockholm city center (8 km) is a perfect match with the easy access from the airport, whether you chose the hotel for accommodation or for your meeting. When you stay here you only have a short walk to the airport which saves you both time and money. In case you come by car there is a free parking in front of the hotel. Next to the hotel you find Bromma Blocks shopping center with more than 80 shops and several cafés. You are also a short walk away from the Solvalla racetrack. At the hotel you find a fully equipped fitness center on the ground floor open 24/7. The restaurant 'Bistro 46', offers good food based on superior quality ingredients available in season. The bar is serving refreshing drinks in a relaxed atmosphere where it is easy to get together. The lounge areas on the floors are popular places for work or to hang out with your friends in.bestwestern.com

name: Hilton Stockholm Slussen
description: Welcome to the Hilton Stockholm Slussen hotel, enjoying wonderful views over the water and the Old Town. The hotel is located in the hip Södermalm area and conveniently located within walking distance to many of Stockholm's main tourist attractions and the city center. All 289 guest and 16 meeting rooms are filled with natural daylight and featuring stylish Swedish décor. Choose from a range of spacious Hilton Guest, Deluxe, Executive rooms and Suites at the Hilton Stockholm Slussen hotel. When upgrading to an Executive room or Suite you will enjoy the breath-taking city and sea views and exclusive access to the hotel’s contemporary Executive lounge. When you want to keep up your fitness regime we offer a selection of cardiovascular equipment and free weights, or you can take part in an energetic exercise class. You can also make an appointment with a personal trainer. In Panorama Restaurant you can enjoy a sumptuous breakfast to get the day off to a great start. Eken Bar offers Scandinavian cuisine with an international twist, serving both lunch and dinner. We use seasonal ingredients, which are locally produced, wherever we can. In Eken Bar, you can sip on a well-made cocktail, while enjoying the lounge music and panoramic views over the city.Hilton

name: Lord Nelson Hotel
description: Located in a narrow 17th-century building in Stockholm’s Old Town, Collector’s Lord Nelson Hotel offers maritime-style rooms with cable TV and free Wi-Fi access. The hotel has a 24 hour reception. All rooms at Lord Nelson Hotel include a tiled bathroom with a shower and hairdryer. Each room has either Hästens or Dux beds and a work desk. A continental breakfast is served every morning in the dining room. Guests can enjoy a glass of wine on the rooftop terrace, which provides wonderful views of the Old Town. Guests can also sit down an relax with a book in the hotel's library. The Royal Palace is located 100 metres from the hotel. Drottninggatan, Stockholm’s main shopping street, is a 4-minute walk away. The nearest metro stop is Gamla Stan, located 350 metres from the property.

name: Lydmar Hotel
description: Situated by the National Museum, this chic waterfront hotel offers views of the Old Town and Royal Palace. It offers a popular bistro-style restaurant and art exhibitions. Free WiFi is available throughout the property. Lydmar Hotel’s spacious rooms are individually decorated and have wooden floors. Many feature original stucco work, wood beams and high windows. All have a TV, minibar. The hotel restaurant serves European cuisine; everything from escargots to steak tartare to Sicilian fish. In the summer, the outdoor terrace offers a relaxing setting where guests can enjoy fresh cocktails. Archipelago boat tours regularly depart from Strömkajen Harbour, which is 100 metres from Lydmar Hotel. Stureplan Square, with its shops and nightlife, is a 10-minute walk away. Staff will happily recommend other local sights and attractions.

name: Nordic Light Hotel
description: This modern Stockholm hotel is located within a 10-minute walk of Cityterminalen Central Bus Station. It is moments from Central Post Office Building and is close to the area's well-known attractions and dining spots. Guests can soak up the sun on the terrace or have a drink at the bar. Facilities include free wireless internet, an express check-in and check-out feature and valet parking. Just a stone's throw from nearby bars and clubs, this 4-star hotel also allows guests to easily discover the best of the local nightlife. Nordic Light Hotel offers 175 rooms, all of which are equipped with cable/satellite channels, a mini bar and tea and coffee making facilities. After settling in to their room, guests can explore the local area with use of Stockholm Central Station, which is a short walk from the hotel. The hotel's restaurant serves local, international and regional cuisine and overlooks the city. Room service is also available during certain times. The area surrounding Nordic is popular for its shopping. Guests can also easily visit Stockholm City Hall, Kungstradgarden and the Royal Swedish Opera.Revato

name: Best Western Plus Grow Hotel
description: Best Western Plus Grow Hotel opened in November 2018 and is a four-star, modern, and sustainable hotel located on the border between Solna and Sundbyberg. Great emphasis has been placed on design and smart digital solutions, and the hotel is a natural destination for the conscious business traveler as well as the weekend traveler who appreciate comfort with a focus on sustainability. In the nine-story building we offer 176 stylish hotel rooms and a relaxation area with sauna and gym. In the lobby there is an inviting lounge and a restaurant, during the summer months also with a large outdoor terrace connected. With an attractive location close to the trendy small town of Sundbyberg with its’ restaurants, shops and great public transportations, the hotel will meet the need for increased service and accommodation in the area. Public transportations to the hotel are very good. The nearest metro station is Solna Strand only 300 meters away. Airport buses to Stockholm Arlanda Airport stop right outside and for guests travelling by car there is a garage next to the hotel. In Sundbyberg's center there is another metro station, a commuter train, and a tram.bestwestern.com

name: Scandic Sjöfartshotellet
description: Located in Stockholm, Scandic Sjofartshotellet is an easy drive from Ericsson Globe and provides private parking on site. It is situated a brief stroll from the Photographic Museum. There are a variety of amenities available to those staying at Hotel Scandic Sjöfartshotellet, such as a sauna, free Wi-Fi and meeting facilities. The front desk operates around the clock and the friendly staff can suggest places to visit and provide other tourist information. Just moments from nearby clubs and bars, this 4-star hotel also allows guests to explore the best of the local nightlife. Scandic Sjöfartshotellet has 212 rooms, all of which are equipped with a variety of facilities to ensure a comfortable stay. The private en suite includes complimentary toiletries in addition to a hair dryer. In-house dining options include Lighthouse Bar & Coffee Shop, which is a convenient place to enjoy a meal. A choice of dining options are also available in the surrounding area. Scandic Sjofartshotellet Stockholm is surrounded by the area's well-known tourist attractions, including Stortorget Stockholm, Mariatorget and Medborgarplatsen, which are within walking distance. It is also within walking distance of Grona Lund.Revato

name: Castle House Inn
description: Castle House Inn is located right in the heart of Stockholm's Old Town, only a 3 minutes' walk to the Royal Palace. Free WiFi access is available. The closest metro station is a 6-minute walk away from the hotel. Rooms are individually decorated. Some rooms have private bathrooms and others have shared facilities. Bed linen and towels are included in your stay. The hotel is 250 metres from the picturesque Stortorget Square of the Old Town and the Nobel Museum. You can take a stroll down the cobbled streets and visit the boutiques and cafes. Many popular restaurants and bars located nearby draw in crowds for lively evenings and nightlife. Ferry connections to the islands of Djurgården and Skeppsholmen are just 500 metres away. Stockholm Central Station is 1.4 km away.

name: Courtyard by Marriott Stockholm Kungsholmen
description: Courtyard Stockholm Kungsholmen invites you to experience 4-star comfort and award-winning convenience. Located in the city center, our hotel offers the best of both worlds: a sense of urban sophistication, plus the calm and tranquility of nature, thanks to our close proximity to Rålambshov's Park. Settle into exceptionally spacious rooms with large windows that let in natural daylight and offer views of the park or the residential area. Challenge yourself to a workout in the modern fitness center, or enjoy a tasty meal at Björk Bar & Grill, a favorite among Stockholm locals. Host your next event with us and take advantage of our sophisticated venues and exceptional planning services. When you're ready to explore, our hotel places attractions like City Hall and Old Town within your reach - and we offer bike rentals, so you can discover Stockholm on two wheels. Your 4-star escape awaits.Marriott

name: Elite Hotel Marina Tower
description: Situated right by Saltsjö Bay, Elite Hotel Marina Tower offers free WiFi and rooms with flat-screen cable TVs. Stockholm city centre is a 10-minute bus ride away. All rooms at Elite Marina Tower Hotel feature contemporary furnishings and wooden floors. Some rooms include a small seating area and a work desk. The hotel’s outside seating offers magnificent views of the bay and Djurgården island. Both Swedish and international meals are on offer at the in-house restaurant. A buffet breakfast is served every morning 06:30-09:30 weekdays and 07-11:00 on weekends. The vibrant Södermalm district is a 5-minute walk away. The nearest bus stop is within 50 metres. The neighbouring Saltsjökvarn Brygga ferry terminal offers connections to Djurgården, as well as Nybrokajen harbour in Östermalm.

name: Maude's Hotel Enskede Stockholm
description: "Room for dreams" The hotel is located in the area of Enskede not far from Stockholm center, Stockholm International Fairs and Globen/Tele2 Arena. The Svedmyra underground station is just steps away, easy access to all areas of the town, including Stockholm central station T-centralen with both Skavsta Airport and Bromma Airport buses and Arlanda Airport Express trains. Re decorations of all the hotel rooms was completed in Januari 2017. The interiors are both spacious and contemporary, enhanced by a personal ambiance. Our guests have complementary coffee or tea with homemade cookies in our lobby lounge. In the hotel lounge or on the beautiful summer terrace you can enjoy your breakfast or a cup of coffee or a drink during the day or in the evening. You can also take full advantage of free private parking area and wireless Internet are included the room rate. Our main focus is making our guests feel at home and well taken care of. Welcome!iHotelier/iStay

name: Best Western Plus Park City Hammarby Sjostad
description: Located in the Hammarby Sjöstad district, this hotel is 5 km from central Stockholm and 200 metres from the Sickla Kaj train stop. It offers free access to Wi-Fi, a gym All guest rooms at Park Inn by Radisson Stockholm Hammarby Sjöstad have a work desk, flat-screen TV and safe. Some also include a seating area. Just across the street from Park Inn is the Hammarbybacken ski slope. During summer, guests might enjoy a walk along the nearby Sickla Canal and Hammarby Lake. Stockholm Central Station is within 10 minutes' drive of Park Inn Hammarby Sjöstad. Ericsson Globe Arena and Tele2 Arena are both only a 5-minute drive away.

name: Metro Apart Hotel
description: Located within 3.4 km of Stockholmsmassan Exhibition & Congress Centre and 4.9 km of Monteliusvägen in Stockholm, Metro Apart Hotel provides accommodation with free WiFi and flat-screen TV. There is a fully equipped private bathroom with shower and a hair dryer. Ericsson Globe is 5.2 km from the aparthotel, while Stockholm Cathedral is 6 km away. The nearest airport is Bromma Stockholm Airport, 10 km from Metro Apart Hotel.

name: Lady Hamilton Hotel
description: This charming hotel is housed in a listed 15th-century building, right next to the Royal Palace in Stockholm’s Old Town. Gamla Stan Metro Station is 400 metres away. Guests can book private access to the on-site sauna and plunge pool. All rooms at Collector’s Lady Hamilton Hotel have cable TV and a private bathroom with eco-friendly toiletries. For added historic feel, most rooms feature old paintings, antique furniture and crystal chandeliers. The hotel's 13th-century cellar well is now used as a relaxing area with a sauna. The in-house Bistro Emma serves afternoon tea during weekends from September through March. Staff at Collector’s Lady Hamilton will gladly recommend local shops, cafés and attractions such as the Nobel Museum. Stockholm Central Station is 1 metro stop away.

name: Sure Hotel by Best Western Spanga
description: This budget hotel is a three minute drive from the E18 and 10 minutes from the E4 Motorway. It offers free private parking, a 24-hour reception desk and a late bar. Private bathrooms, cable TV and simple decor are standard features in all rooms at the Sure Hotel by Best Western Spanga. The Bromma Airport is seven kilometers from Stockholm-Spanga. Avestagatan Bus Stop is 30 meters away and a five minute ride from Spanga Station. Trains connect to Stockholm Central Station in 12 minutes. The Sure Hotel by Best Western Spanga is a great choice for travelers interested in riverside walks, cafes and convenient public transport.bestwestern.com

name: Victory Hotel
description: Situated in Stockholm’s picturesque Old Town, Collector's Victory Hotel is 2 minutes’ walk from Gamla Stan Metro Station. Its uniquely decorated rooms have a flat-screen TV and heated bathroom floors. Inspired by its own maritime antique collection, the rooms at Collector’s Victory Hotel feature a naval theme. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the hotel. The on-site restaurant, Djuret, serves both meat and seafood dishes, using locally sourced and organic produce. Guest can also unwind with a drink in the cosy lounge bar Tweed, or visit the wine bar The Burgundy. Leisure options at Collector’s Victory include a sauna and a plunge pool.

name: Hellstens Malmgård
description: Modern and cosy, Hotel Hellstens Malmgard is located in Stockholm and provides free Wi-Fi. The various amenities this elegant hotel offers include a currency exchange, luggage storage and meeting rooms. Rooms feature a flat-screen TV, heating and a desk. They are also equipped with cable/satellite channels, a telephone and a shower. Hellstens Malmgård offers a convenient in-house café where guests can have a meal before heading out to explore the area. There is also a range of breakfast options on offer every morning. Hotel Hellstens Malmgård is close to Stockholm's well-known attractions, with the Folkoperan just a 10-minute stroll away. Stortorget Stockholm, Stockholm Palace and Kungstradgarden are just a short car ride from the hotel.Revato

name: Good Morning+ Hägersten
description: This hotel is set a 15-minute drive from central Stockholm. Free private parking and rooms with a flat-screen TV as well as free WiFi access are offered. The E4 Highway is 500 metres away. All the brightly decorated rooms, an armchair and a work desk. Each room has a tiled bathroom with shower. The on-site restaurant serves a variety of dishes from Monday to Saturday from 17:00 until 22:00. Drinks can be enjoyed in the bar until 23:30. A buffet breakfast is served each morning at Good Morning+ Hägersten. Meals and drinks can be enjoyed on the terrace during summer. Guests can work out at the on-site Actic Gym Bromma Airport and Stockholm International Fairs are both within a 10-minute drive of the hotel. Good Morning+ Hägersten offers a free shuttle service to selected fairs on request. Västertorp Metro Station is 800 metres away.

name: Liljeholmens Stadshotell
description: Liljeholmens Stadshotell offers free Wi-Fi and rooms with private or shared bathroom facilities. It is located in the Liljeholmen area in Stockholm, 250 metres from Liljeholmstorget Shopping Centre. All rooms at Liljeholmens have a seating area and a work desk. Fridges are available for rent on site. Guests can take advantage of the internet computers in the 24-hour reception area. Laundry facilities are available for guests’ convenience. A buffet breakfast is offered each morning. Non-alcoholic drinks and snacks can be bought on site. Liljeholmen Metro Station is a 3-minute walk away or about a 1-minute ride on the Nybohovshiss lift, which is right around the corner from the hotel. Stockholm city centre and the Old Town are both within a 10-minute metro ride away.

name: Birka Hotel
description: Housed in a historical building, a former brewery dating back to 1722, Birka Hotel offers private rooms. The hotel has undergone a complete interior renovation which finished 2022. Free WiFi is included and available in all rooms. All units in the hotel are equipped with a kettle and a flat-screen TV. All rooms have a private bathroom fitted with a shower and a hairdryer, and some rooms also offer a seating area. At the accommodation all rooms have bed linen and towels. Hötorget Metro Station is 1 minute walk away, providing easy access to Stockholm's transport network. The nightlife around Stureplan Square is a 5-minute walk from the hotel. Drottninggatan shopping street is 300 metres away.

name: Hotell Vastmannagatan No.61
description: Rooms Stay in one of 6 guestrooms featuring flat-screen televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access is available to keep you connected. Bathrooms with showers are provided. Conveniences include desks, and housekeeping is provided daily. Business}, Other Amenities Featured amenities include a 24-hour front desk, an elevator, and coffee/tea in a common area. Property Location With a stay at Hotell Västmannagatan no.61, you'll be centrally located in Stockholm, within a 15-minute drive of Gröna Lund and Avicii Arena. This hotel is 2.5 mi (4.1 km) from Vasa Museum and 2.6 mi (4.2 km) from Skansen. Dining Buffet breakfasts are served on weekdays from 6:30 AM to 9:30 AM and on weekends from 8:00 AM to 11:00 AM for a fee. Optional Charges Fee for buffet breakfast: approximately SEK 125 per person The above list may not be comprehensive. Fees and deposits may not include tax and are subject to change. Check-In Checkin starts at 3:00 PM Checkin end at midnight The minimum age of Checkin 18 Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on property policy Government-issued photo identification and a credit card, debit card, or cash deposit may be required at check-in for incidental charges Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges; special requests cannot be guaranteed This property accepts credit cards; cash is not accepted Be prepared: check the latest COVID-19 travel requirements and measures in place for this destination before you travel. Front desk staff will greet guests on arrival. Check-Out Checkout is done at 12:00 PM Pets Pets not allowedViajes Exito Hotels

name: Sure Hotel by Best Western Stockholm Alvsjo
description: This hotel is about 10 minutes' walk from Stockholm International Fairs and Älvsjö Train Station. Guests enjoy free sauna access and free WiFi. All rooms of Connect Hotel Stockholm have a flat-screen TV. Bathroom facilities are either private or shared. A variety of dishes and refreshments are served in the Living Room, the hotel’s combined restaurants, bar and TV lounge. Connect Hotel Stockholm is an environmentally friendly hotel.

name: Hotel Sven Vintappare
address: Sven Vintappares Gränd 3, Stockholm, Stockholms Lan
description: Housed in an early 17th-century building in the heart of Stockholm’s Old Town, Hotel Sven Vintappare offers rooms with flat-screen TVs and Gustavian-style furnishings. Västerlånggatan shopping street is 50 metres away. All the traditional guest rooms at Sven Vintappare Hotel feature exposed wooden beams and a pantry with china dinner sets. Each room has a private bathroom with shower and heated marble floors. Guests can start their day with a breakfast in the hotel café, situated in a medieval wine cellar. The staff can help reserve tickets to a variety of events. The Nobel Museum is 150 metres away. The Royal Palace is a 5-minute walk from the hotel.

name: Mälardrottningen Hotel
description: Mälardrottningen Yacht Hotel & Restaurant provides a unique experience aboard an elegant 73-metre yacht, permanently docked at Riddarholmen Island, next to Stockholm’s charming Old Town. It features wonderful views of Riddarfjärden Bay. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout Mälardrottningen Hotel. Guests stay in cabins, decorated with dark timber finish, carpeting and portholes. Upon arrival, guests enter the reception via a gangplank into a beautifully designed lobby with teak panelling and nautical décor. The TV lounge is found above the engine room, which can be viewed through the glass floors. The glassed-in Mälardrottningen Restaurant is found on the fore deck, facing City Hall, and includes an open dining terrace. The bar is set in the former wheelhouse. Mälardrottningen Yacht Hotel is 500 metres from Gamla Stan Metro Station, and Stockholm Central Station is reached in about 10 minutes’ on foot.

name: Hotel Zinkensdamm
description: Situated in the trendy Södermalm district in Stockholm, by the green oasis of Tantolunden Park, is STF Hotel Zinkensdamm. It offers modern rooms with free WiFi access. All rooms at STF Hotel Zinkensdamm have wooden floors, and are decorated in warm, earthy tones. They include flat-screen TVs and well planned work areas. On-site leisure options include mini golf, a relaxing sauna and a playground for children. Guests can rent bicycles at the hotel. The Zinkadus Bar & Café serves traditional Swedish dishes. Outdoor dining is possible during warm summer evenings. A buffet breakfast is served every day. Hornstull Metro Station is a 10-minute walk away. Stockholm city centre and the Old Town are both within an 8-minute metro ride.

name: Hotel Söder
description: Hotel Söder is situated in the trendy Södermalm district of Stockholm, 250 metres from Medborgarplatsen Square. It offers free Wi-Fi and rooms with flat-screen cable TVs and private bathrooms with shower. The modern guest rooms at Söder Hotel feature a seating area. All rooms have wooden floors and a work desk. A full breakfast with cereals, bread and hot options is served every morning in the dining room. Free tea and coffee are available at all times. Medborgarplatsen Metro Station is 250 metres from the hotel. Stockholm city centre and the Old Town are both within is a 5-minute metro ride away.

name: Hotell Skeppsbron
description: Offering guest rooms in refurbished underground vaults, Hotell Skeppsbron is set in the Old Town district of Stockholm, 300 metres from The Royal Palace. The picturesque Stortorget square and Nobel Museum are only a few minutes' walk away. Bathroom facilities are private or shared. Guests have access to a shared lounge. Slippers are available upon request. There are many shopping, restaurants, bars, and cafe options within walking distance. Gamla Stan Metro Station and Kungsträgården Park are within 700 metres of the hotel.

name: Hotel Bema
description: Set in the Vasastan district of central Stockholm, Hotel Bema offers free WiFi, free tea/coffee and bright rooms with a flat-screen TV. Drottninggatan shopping street is a 3-minute walk away. A desk, an electric kettle and a private bathroom with shower are standard at Bema Hotel. Some rooms have views of Tegnerlunden Park, while others overlook the inner courtyard. Breakfast can be arranged at a nearby café, if requested in advance. Rådmansgatan Metro Station is 700 metres away, while Stockholm Central Station is a 10-minute walk from the hotel.

name: Scandic Sodra Kajen
description: Rooms Make yourself at home in one of the 283 guestrooms. Complimentary wireless Internet access is available to keep you connected. Private bathrooms have complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include phones and safes, and housekeeping is provided on request. Amenities Be sure to enjoy recreational amenities including a sauna and a 24-hour fitness center. This hotel also features complimentary wireless Internet access, an arcade/game room, and shopping on site. Business}, Other Amenities Featured amenities include dry cleaning/laundry services, a 24-hour front desk, and multilingual staff. Planning an event in Stockholm? This hotel has facilities measuring 7589 square feet (705 square meters), including a conference center. Property Location With a stay at Scandic Ariadne in Stockholm (Central Stockholm), you'll be within a 5-minute drive of Värtahamnen Ferry Terminal and Stockholm Olympic Stadium. This hotel is 2.1 mi (3.3 km) from Vasa Museum and 2.6 mi (4.1 km) from Gröna Lund. Dining Enjoy a satisfying meal at Mistral serving guests of Scandic Ariadne. Wrap up your day with a drink at the bar/lounge. A complimentary buffet breakfast is served on weekdays from 6:30 AM to 9:30 AM and on weekends from 7:30 AM to 10:30 AM. Renovations This property is closed from November 1 2022 to June 1 2024 (dates subject to change). Optional Charges Nearby parking fee: SEK 110 per night (33 ft away) Pet fee: SEK 200 per accommodation, per stay Service animals are exempt from fees Early check-in fee: SEK 150 (subject to availability) The above list may not be comprehensive. Fees and deposits may not include tax and are subject to change. name: Sofo Hotel
description: In the vibrant Söder district of Stockholm, is the Sofo Hotel, offering oriental inspired decor and easy access to the city’s shopping and nightlife. Stockholm Old Town is 1.9 km away. Each room at the Sofo Hotel will provide you with a flat-screen TV and desk. Free WiFi access is available. The private bathrooms include a shower. Other facilities offered at the property include luggage storage. The hotel is 1.7 km from Ericsson Globe, 1.9 km from Tele2 Arena and 39 km from Arlanda Airport.

name: Hotel Hornsgatan
description: Hotel Hornsgatan with 22 rooms offers a cozy, calm and personal atmosphere in a building from 1905. All our rooms have a desk, wardobe, chairs and windows that can be opened. Wifi and our breakfast buffet are always included in the price. The hotel is located next to Mariatorget at Södermalm in Stockholm, a popular area well-known for its restaurants, bars and shops. The hotel is located within walking distance to Slussen and the old Town. The closest underground station is Mariatorget and the closest commuter train station is Stockholm Södra. We offer three different categories of rooms. Rooms with shared bathroom in the corridor or rooms with private bathrooms located one floor up in the building. On the ground floor, across our courtyard and two stairs down we have five rooms with private bathroom that have access to a fully equipped shared kitchen and small seating area.

name: Generator Stockholm
description: Generator Stockholm is set in Stockholm and is a short walk from Cityterminalen Central Bus Station. Those staying at the property can also enjoy free wireless internet. There are a variety of amenities available to guests of the hostel, such as a 24-hour reception, a coffee bar and meeting rooms. In addition, the multilingual staff are on hand to provide assistance. Just moments from nearby clubs and bars, this 3-star hostel also allows guests to discover the best of the local nightlife. The modern rooms feature views of the city. Bar Hilma is a modern place at Generator Stockholm to relax with a beverage after dinner. A selection of dining options can also be found in the surrounding area. Generator Stockholm is ideally situated for discovering Stockholm with Central Post Office Building, Hotorget and Tegnerlunden within walking distance. Sergels Torg, Drottninggatan and Stockholm City Hall are a short stroll away.Revato

name: Ersta Konferens & Hotell
description: Housed in a refurbished 19th-century building, this Stockholm property is in a quiet part of the Södermalm district. It offers functional accommodation with free Wi-Fi internet access and 3 shared kitchenettes. The guest rooms at Ersta Konferens & Hotel have parquet floor or carpet, all rooms include TV. Guests can choose between a private bathroom and shared facilities. Hairdryers is available in every room and a service room with ironing facilities is available on every floor. During warmer months, guests can enjoy breakfast on the hotel terrace. Hairdryers and ironing facilities can be borrowed for free at reception. The Ersta Sjukhus Bus Stop is 150 metres from the hotel, while Slussen Metro Station is within 15 minutes walk. The Fjällgatan street, located just around the corner, provides panoramic views of Saltsjön Bay and central Stockholm.

name: City Backpackers Hostel
description: This hostel is set in a 19th-century building, 500 metres from Stockholm Central Station and 5 minutes’ walk from Drottninggatan shopping street. WiFi internet, evening sauna and pasta are free. Ice skates can be borrowed for free during winter. All rooms at City Backpackers Hostel have air conditioning and heating. Lockers are available and padlocks can be bought in the reception. Snacks and drinks are available in the reception throughout the day. For self-caterers, there is a fully equipped kitchen with microwaves and refrigerators. Guests can also enjoy a meal or drink in the restaurant Nomad, located next to the hostel. The lounge offers Mac and PC computers with free internet access, TV with cable channels and Swedish movie nights. There is also a library with magazines and a book exchange. During summer, the beautiful open courtyard is furnished with tables and chairs

name: Scandic Kista
description: Located in Stockholm, Scandic Kista is within a 10-minute drive of Solvalla and offers disabled parking. It provides free Wi-Fi, a bar and is close to Kista Galleria. There are a variety of facilities at the hotel on offer to guests, such as a sauna, an express check-in and check-out feature and a gym. For those travelling with children Scandic Kista offers a games room. Rooms at Scandic Kista are well-appointed and have a private bathroom, a desk and a flat-screen TV. They are also fitted with cable/satellite channels, ironing facilities and a hair dryer. To make sure the day gets off to a good start, a buffet breakfast is provided every morning at the hotel's restaurant. A variety of eating options are also found in the area. Scandic Kista is ideally located for exploring Stockholm with Kista Science City within walking distance. Stockholm's Golf Club is within a short drive from the hotel.Revato

name: Welcome Hotel Barkarby
description: This good-value hotel is 15 minutes’ train ride from Stockholm city centre. It features free Wi-Fi, in-room flat-screen TVs and gym. For an extra charge, the Welcome SPA offers two outdoor pools, heated to 38 degrees all year, two saunas and a cold bath. Welcome Hotel Barkarby’s popular breakfast buffet includes hot and cold dishes. The in-house à la carte restaurant serves both Swedish and international cuisine. Parking is free on site. Facilities include a free internet computer and pool table. The Barkarby Shopping Area and Stockholm Quality Outlet are 5 minutes’ drive from the hotel, offering 100 shops and outlet stores. Järvafältet Nature Reserve with its walking and jogging trails is 5 minutes’ walk away. Friends Arena is a 15-minute drive away.

name: Stf Långholmen Hostel Beds
description: Boasting a garden, a shared lounge as well as a bar, STF Långholmen Hostel Beds is situated in the centre of Stockholm, 2.4 km from Monteliusvägen. The property is around 4.4 km from Stockholm City Hall, 4.5 km from Stockholm Central Station and 4.6 km from Royal Swedish Opera. The accommodation features a shared kitchen and free WiFi throughout the property. At the hostel, the rooms include a wardrobe. At STF Långholmen Hostel Beds the rooms have a shared bathroom with a shower. Museum of Medieval Stockholm is 4.7 km from the accommodation, while Stockholm Cathedral is 4.9 km from the property. The nearest airport is Bromma Stockholm Airport, 8 km from STF Långholmen Hostel Beds.

name: Lilla Brunn
description: Situated on a peaceful street in Stockholm’s Vasastan neighbourhood, this hostel is 5 minutes’ walk from Odenplan Metro Station. It offers free Wi-Fi and a communal, fully-equipped kitchen. Housed in a charming 18th-century building, Lilla Brunn’s rooms feature simple yet comfortable furnishings. Bathroom facilities are shared. Guest can walk to several restaurants, bars and shops on the neighbouring Sveavägen and Odengatan streets. Stockholm City Library and Stockholm Observatory are just around the corner.

name: Rygerfjord Hotel & Hostel
description: Rygerfjord Hotel & Hostel is housed in 3 ships anchored at the southern shore of Lake Mälaren in Stockholm. It offers free WiFi and cabin-style rooms with city and lake views. At Rygerfjord Hotel & Hostel, guests can choose rooms with either private or shared bathrooms, that are spread over 3 boats. Guests also have access to shared kitchen facilities. Bed linen and towels are included. The on-board restaurant serves Swedish classics, such as meatballs and mashed potatoes, while drinks can also be enjoyed in the bar. Relaxation options include a guest lounge with a large flat-screen TV and comfortable leather armchairs. A free internet computer is found in the lobby. Both Stockholm’s Old Town and the trendy Södermalm district are within a 10-minute walk from the ship.

name: Bed&Breakfast in nature 12 min from city free bikes
description: Boasting free bikes, a garden, and a terrace, Bed&Breakfast in nature 12 min from city free bikes features accommodation in Stockholm with free WiFi and garden views. Featuring a patio, the bed and breakfast is in an area where guests can engage in activities such as hiking and cycling. The kitchen has a fridge, a dishwasher and an oven and there is shower with free toiletries and a hairdryer. The bed and breakfast offers a continental or vegetarian breakfast. Sickla Beach is 2.7 km from Bed&Breakfast in nature 12 min from city free bikes, while Tele2 Arena is 3.4 km from the property. The nearest airport is Bromma Stockholm Airport, 16 km from the accommodation.

name: Stay Xtra Hotel Kista
description: Stay Xtra Hotel is conveniently located in Kista, just 2 km from Kista Galleria Shopping Mall and 3 km from the Kistamässan Exhibition Centre. Free WiFi access is available. Each of Stay Xtra Hotel's guest rooms feature a desk, wooden floors and a TV with satellite channels. The private bathroom includes a hairdryer and free toiletries. At Stay Xtra Hotel Kista you will also find a snack bar and a shared lounge. The hotel is 1.9 km from Kista Science City and 26 km from Stockholm Arlanda Airport. The nearest Metro Station, Akalla, is 200 metres from the hotel.

name: Stf Af Chapman & Skeppsholmen
description: Located on Skeppsholmen island in Stockholm, this STF hostel is split between a late 1800s ship called Af Chapman and former navy barracks called Hantverkshuset. Moderna Museum and East Asia Museum within walking distance. Guest can choose from guest rooms or ship cabins. The guest rooms located in the main building feature large windows, high ceiling and views of the water or park. Some of the ship cabins have a small sitting area and a small window with a city view. Both options include access to shared bathroom facilities. Guests can enjoy a traditional Swedish breakfast buffet. The on-site café serves light meals. There is also a shared kitchen where guests can prepare own meals. During June to August, guests can relax on the sun deck on Af Chapman. The Östasiatiska Museet Bus Stop is 150 metres from the hostel. Kungsträdgården Metro Station is 10 minutes’ walk from STF af Chapman & Skeppsholmen.

name: Crafoord Place
description: This hostel is 15 minutes’ walk from Stockholm Central Station, as well as the shopping and entertainment around the Drottninggatan/Hötorget area. It offers free WiFi throughout the property. The basic rooms at Crafoord Place all have views over the city and water, as well as a wardrobe with a mirror. Bathroom facilities are shared. Guests have access to a shared kitchen equipped with a microwave and a fridge. Other communal facilities at Crafoord Place include BBQ equipment, laundry facilities and a guest computer. A variety of restaurants and cafés can also be found in the area. Stockholm Observatory and the Strindberg Museum are within 1 km of the property. The metrostop S:t Eriksplan is a 10-minute walk away.

name: Lilla Rådmannen
description: Welcome to Freys Hotel Lilla Rdmannen. We have a fantastic reputation for our professional and personal service and for our warm and friendly atmosphere.The hotel is located in a peaceful area in the heart of Stockholm just moments away from the busy shopping street Drottninggatan. This charming part of the city is also known for its antique and vintage shops and many green parks. Stop for a chat, a drink or a snack in the cosy lobby bar or discover the many cafs, restaurants and trendy bar in the neighborhood. The hotel has 62 individually decorated stylish rooms. Hotel Lilla Rdmannen is the perfect base for visiting Stockholm!iHotelier/iStay

name: Hotell Dialog
description: Hotel Dialog offers basic accommodation in Stockholm, 1 km from the world’s largest IKEA store at Kungens Kurva. It offers private parking on site and rooms with free Wi-Fi. All rooms at Dialog Hotel have a TV and private bathroom. A portable DVD player, hairdryer and iron can be borrowed from the convenient 24-hour reception. A buffet breakfast is served every morning, while drinks and snacks are available at the lobby kiosk. Laundry services are also possible. The nearby retail park at Kungens Kurva provides a variety of shopping and entertainment options, including the Nordic region's largest cinema in the Heron City mall. A bus stop is located just across the street and the nearest underground station is a 15-minute walk from the hotel. Stockholm city centre is a 20-minute drive away.

name: HomeX Hotel for Gamers
description: Located in Stockholm, 11 km from Friends Arena, HomeX Gamers Hotel provides accommodation with a terrace, free private parking, a restaurant and a bar. The property is close to several well-known attractions, less than 1 km from Stockholm Central Station, a 1-minute walk from Royal Swedish Opera and 200 metres from Museum of Medieval Stockholm. The Royal Palace is 500 metres from the hotel and Vasa Museum is 15 km away. Guests at the hotel will be able to enjoy activities in and around Stockholm, like cycling. Popular points of interest near HomeX Gamers Hotel include Sergels Torg Square, Stureplan and Army Museum. The nearest airport is Bromma Stockholm Airport, 17 km from the accommodation.

name: Freys Hotel
description: Welcome to Freys Hotel a historic hotel right in the heart of Stockholm. Freys Hotel has a fantastic reputation for our professional and personal service and for our warm and friendly atmosphere. The Hotel is one of Stockholms oldest brands with a rich history filled with exciting events and interesting stories. We stem from one of the oldest transportation companies in Sweden, registered as early as 1896. Freys hotel has 127 beautiful rooms, all individually decorated with high comfort and style. The hotel is the perfect starting point for your business or shopping trip. Stockholms shopping district is just around the corner and sightseeing tours and entertainment is just a few minutes away.The express train from the Arlanda stops on the opposite side of the street next to the Central Station.iHotelier/iStay

name: The Red Boat
description: Set over 2 boats, this hostel is anchored at Riddarfjärden Bay of Lake Mälaren in central Stockholm. It provides a restaurant with lunch and dinner options, a bar and two sun terraces with outdoor furniture. Each simply decorated room at Den Röda Båten includes wooden furnishings, bed linen and a wardrobe. Most cabins have shared bathroom facilities, which are located in the hallway. Superior cabins include a private bathroom. Some cabins feature views of the lake. Free WiFi is available on both boats. A daily breakfast buffet is available at Röda Båten. Slussen Metro Station and the city’s historic Old Town are both within 650 metres of the hostel. The trendy Södermalm district, 10 minutes’ walk away, offers a wide selection of shopping, dining and nightlife choices. Stockholm Central Station is a 3-minute Metro ride away.

name: Mosebacke Hostel
description: Just 15 minutes’ walk from Stockholm’s Old Town, this good-value hostel is on Mosebacke Hill in vibrant Södermalm. It offers free WiFi and a fully equipped communal kitchen. The modern, air-conditioned rooms at Mosebacke Hostel have a TV. All rooms are without windows and are brightly decorated and have wooden floors. Bathrooms facilities are shared or private. Guests can relax and play cards and other games in the hostel's lobby. Laundry facilities are also available. Breakfast is served each morning at the hostel. The area around Mosebacke Hostel has many shops, bars and restaurants. Slussen Metro Station is just around the corner.

name: Bo Hotel
description: Located by Tele2 Arena in Stockholm’s Tolv shopping area, this hotel offers rooms with a flat-screen TV and free WiFi access. Bo Hotel is 500 metres from Globen Metro Station. All the air-conditioned rooms at Bo Hotel feature a private bathroom with a shower, hairdryer and free toiletries. Stockholm Central Station is a 10-minute metro ride away. The surrounding Tolv shopping area offers a bowling alley and a variety of shops, restaurants and bars.

name: Skanstulls Boutique Hostel
description: This modern hostel is in vibrant Södermalm, 150 metres from Skanstull Metro Station. It offers a guest kitchen and free WiFi. Stockholm Central Station is 4 metro stops away. All rooms at Skanstulls Boutique Hostel feature bright, unique décor and either private or shared bathrooms. Skanstulls Boutique Hostel collaborates with a café (Lilla Caféet på Söder) located in the neighbour buildning (Ringvägen 131) where all the guests get 10% off on their meny. Free pasta and spices are available in the guest kitchen. Other facilities include a dining area, small library, luggage room and laundry. Tele2 Arena and the Ericsson Globe are 2 metro stops from Skanstulls Boutique Hostel.

name: Best Western Kom Hotel Stockholm
description: As a guest at the Best Western Kom Hotel Stockholm, you not only have an ideal location in the city center, but also a welcoming and homely atmosphere. With our 143 rooms and conference facilities the hotel is just as good whether you are here for business or pleasure. The hotel is owned by the YWCA-YMCA Central which is a non-profit organization with over 2,000 members, ranging from basketball, gymnastics, camps for music, choirs, orchestras, youth choir and more. All our profits go to the YWCA-YMCA Central's children and youth. The rooms are spacious and have good workspace and Wi-Fi. All rooms also have shower, hair dryer, iron, ironing board, safe, and free television. Garage is available but must be pre booked as we have limited space. Guests have free access to the gym, so you can stay in shape even when you're on the road. The gym is well equipped and has changing rooms plus a sauna. The dining room serves a large breakfast buffet each morning. The Best Western Kom Hotel Stockholm is certified by Ecolabel, which means that we do our utmost to reduce energy consumption and use of chemicals. Here you can sleep with good conscience. From January 1, 2018, Best Western Kom Hotel is entirely cash free. It will be faster and easier for you as a guest, and you will be contributing to the safety of our staff. You can pay with all major credit cards or prepayment via 3rd party authorization. Thank you for your understanding and for helping us make our working environment safer.bestwestern.com

name: Unique Hotel Jungfrugatan
description: Conveniently located in the centre of Stockholm, Unique Hotel Jungfrugatan offers air-conditioned rooms, a restaurant, free WiFi and a bar. This 4-star hotel offers luggage storage space. Private parking is available on site. All guest rooms in the hotel are fitted with a flat-screen TV. Featuring a private bathroom with a shower and a hairdryer, some units at Unique Hotel Jungfrugatan also have a city view. At the accommodation all rooms have bed linen and towels. Popular points of interest near Unique Hotel Jungfrugatan include Army Museum, Stureplan and Vasa Museum. The nearest airport is Bromma Stockholm Airport, 11 km from the hotel.

name: Stockholm Ängby Camping
description: Stockholm Ängby Camping offers basic accommodation with standard facilities in Stockholm, 10 km from Stockholm City Hall. Free WiFi and parking are offered. A terrace with garden views is offered in each unit as well as a kitchenette. Stockholm Ängby Camping provides a children's playground, a barbecue and a tennis court. Långholmen is 10 km from the accommodation. The nearest airport is Bromma Stockholm Airport, 6 km from the property.

name: Unity Hammarby Sjöstad Stockholm
description: Located in Stockholm, 1.9 km from Sickla Beach and 3.7 km from the centre, UNITY Hammarby Sjöstad provides air-conditioned accommodation with free WiFi, and a fitness centre. Private parking is available on site. The aparthotel offers a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a hair dryer, free toiletries and walk-in shower. A fridge, a stovetop and kitchenware are also provided, as well as a kettle. A continental, vegetarian or vegan breakfast is available daily at the property. At UNITY Hammarby Sjöstad you will find a restaurant serving European cuisine. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy skiing nearby, or make the most of the sun terrace. Tele2 Arena is 1.7 km from UNITY Hammarby Sjöstad, while Fotografiska - Museum of Photography is 3.6 km away. The nearest airport is Bromma Stockholm Airport, 15 km from the aparthotel.

name: Aiden by Best Western Stockholm City
description: Aiden By Best Western Stockholm City offers a modern design with a peaceful atmosphere, close to city life, and excellent connections to central Stockholm and Arlanda Airport. Nearby, you'll find the Fridhemsplan subway station, only two stops from the central station. The hotel is centrally located at Alstromergatan 39, on Kungsholmen in Stockholm, keeping you close to attractions, restaurants, and entertainment. Shopping enthusiasts will also be pleased, as the hotel is just a stone's throw away from the trendy Vastermalmsgallerian. We offer hotel rooms of various sizes, ranging from small rooms without windows to rooms that can accommodate up to five people. Choose the one that suits your needs best. All overnight guests have free access to the hotel's sauna. You will also have access to wireless internet in all rooms and public areas at no extra cost. Garage parking is available adjacent to the hotel. We offer a daily breakfast buffet in a peaceful environment.bestwestern.com

name: Grand Hôtel Stockholm
description: Grand Hôtel Stockholm is situated on the waterfront opposite the Royal Palace and the Old Town, 1 km from Central Station. It offers fine dining, a spa and free WiFi access. Grand’s air-conditioned rooms have an LCD TV with satellite channels and a minibar. Rooms also offer courtyard, city or waterfront views. Grand Hôtel Nordic Spa & Fitness has exercise equipment and an in-door pool. Spa treatments include facials, foot massages and naprapathy. Grand Stockholm also offers chauffeur-driven limousine transfers and 24-hour room service.

name: Pärlan Hotell
description: This family-owned hotel is a 5-minute walk from Östermalmstorg Metro Station and 2 minutes’ walk from Strandvägen waterfront promenade. It offers a guest TV lounge, free Wi-Fi and modern rooms with a classic twist. Wooden floors, private bathrooms and street or courtyard views are standard at Pärlan Hotell. Decorative details may include floral wallpaper, wrought-iron beds or draped curtains. Some rooms feature a flat-screen TV and work desk. Leather sofas, an ornate fireplace and traditional tile stove make for an atmospheric communal lounge. Its cosy balcony faces the inner courtyard. Hotell Pärlan is 2 metro stops from Stockholm’s Old Town, Gamla Stan. Stureplan’s bars, shops and nightclubs are within 10 minutes’ walk. Staff can book local restaurants or recommend nearby attractions such as Djurgården island.

name: Hotel With Urban Deli
description: This trendy hotel is located 1 floor below the popular Urban Deli restaurant and marketplace in central Stockholm. You can reach Sergels Torg Square and the lively Stureplan dining and shopping area within 500 metres. High-speed WiFi is available. The industrial-modern rooms are fitted with a flat-screen TV, satellite channels and media sound system. The tiled bathroom features a rain shower. Rooms are without windows. The Royal Palace is 1.2 km from Hotel With Urban Deli, while Gamla Stan is 1.4 km from the property. Bromma Airport is 7 km away.

name: Stf Långholmen Hostel
description: This hostel is housed in a refurbished 1800s prison building, on the central Stockholm island of Långholmen. Surrounded by greenery, it offers a restaurant, a shared kitchen and free Wi-Fi and parking. STF Långholmen Hostel’s rooms have a private bathroom or shared facilities. Some rooms include a TV. In summer, guests can unwind in the garden. Other facilities include rental bikes and bookable washing machines and dryers. The sandy Långholmsbadet beach is just 50 metres from STF Långholmen, while Hornstull Metro Station is within 10 minutes’ walk. The scenic surroundings provide opportunities for relaxing walks. The nearby Hornstull district has plenty of restaurants and bars.

name: Good Morning Kista
description: Situated just off European Route E4, Good Morning Kista is 15 minutes’ drive from central Stockholm. Early breakfest from 06:00 and free parking are offered here. Husby Metro Station is 7 minutes’ walk away. The modern guest rooms at Good Morning Kista have a private bathroom and a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. WiFi access is available throughout the entire hotel. Dinner can be enjoyed at the on-site restaurant & bar, that also offers a 24-hour snack menu. Kista Galleria Shopping Centre and Kista Science City are both within a 20-minute walk from the hotel. Stockholm city centre is a 20-minute metro ride away.

name: Hostel by Bromma
description: Located just 1.4 km from Bromma Airport, this hostel offers free on-site parking and free WiFi. Solvalla Horse Race Track is 3.6 km away. Central Stockholm can be reached in 30 minutes via public transport. Bromma Hus Hostel offers bright dormitory rooms with shared bathroom facilities. Guests can relax in the shared lounge. Other facilities include a children's playground. Shopping is available at Bromma Blocks, just 850 metres away from the hostel. Drottningholm Palace is 6.6 km away from Bromma Hus Hostel, while the centre of Bromma and Brommaplan are about 3 km away.

name: Hotel Point
description: Located in the trendy SoFo district of Stockholm, Hotel Point is close to restaurants, cafes, theatres and nightlife. This hotel is 1.4 km from Stockholm’s Old Town and 2 km from the Ericsson Globe Arena. Stockholm Central Station is 12-minutes away by metro. Each room here includes free WiFi, an electric kettle and a cable TV. The fresh bathroom has a shower and hairdryer. Hotel Point’s restaurant serves a daily breakfast buffet. Other facilities offered at the hotel include a 24-hour front desk, ticketing service and luggage storage. If you feel like exploring the city, Vasa Museum and the ABBA Museum can be reached in 35-minutes from the hotel via public transportation. Stockholm Arlanda Airport is 43 km away.

name: City Lodge Stockholm
address: Klara Norra Kyrkogata 15, 111 22 Stockholm, Stockholms Lan
description: Just 2 minutes’ walk from Stockholm Central Station, this hostel is 200 metres from Drottninggatan shopping street. Free WiFi is available. Personal lockers are found in each room at City Lodge Stockholm. Bathroom facilities are shared, and some rooms have their own wash basin. A laundry room with ironing equipment is also available. The property offers a communal kitchen. Guests can also relax in the shared TV lounge, read a book or play board games. T-Centralen Metro Station is within 200 metres. Stockholm’s Old Town, Gamla Stan, is 1 metro stop away.

name: Castanea Old Town Hostel
description: Located in the centre of Stockholm’s Old Town, this hostel is 3 minutes’ walk from the Gamla Stan Metro Station. It features a communal, fully equipped kitchen, along with bright, fresh rooms. Each simple room at the environmentally-friendly Castanea Old Town Hostel has wooden floors and access to shared bathroom facilities. Free WiFi is available in public areas of Castanea Hostel. Ironing facilities, hairdryers and books can also be borrowed. The Royal Palace is just 200 metres away, while Stockholm Central Station is 1.5 km from the hostel. Guests can choose from a variety of dining and shopping options just outside of the 18th-century building.

name: Rex Petit
description: This good-value hotel is set in a 19th-century building, 10 minutes’ walk from shopping and entertainment at Hötorget and Drottninggatan. It offers soundproofed, compact rooms without windows but with flat-screen TVs and free WiFi. Guests are welcome to enjoy free coffee/tea at the sister hotel Rex Hotel, located upstairs, where breakfast also is served. Numerous restaurants are found nearby, and staff are always willing to make a recommendation or booking. Gym and sauna facilities can be used at a sister hotel across the road. Hotel Rex Petit is just around the corner from Rådmansgatan Metro Station, which is 3 stops from Stockholm's Old Town.

name: Hotel Tre Små Rum
description: No description found

name: Livington Hotel
description: A newly opened hotel, Livington Hotel in Stockholm, August 5 2021. Attractively situated in Vällingby in the west part of Stockholm. To reach Stockhom City centre it is 12 km with car and approx 30 minutes with underground, Johannelund is the closest underground station only 200m away from the hotel. Distance to Bromma Airport is 5 km and Arlanda Airport 30 km. Wi-fi and private parking is free. The rooms are equipped with air conditioning, shower and hairdryer. All hotel rooms have private bathroom. There are coffee and tea making facilities in deluxe rooms. Museum of Medieval Stockholm is 13 km from Livington hotell, while Stockholm Cathedral is 13 km from the property. The nearest airport is Bromma Stockholm Airport, 5 km from the accommodation.

name: Unique Hotel
description: Just 250 metres from the Drottninggatan shopping street, this hotel offers free WiFi internet access and rooms with a TV. Stockholm Central Station is about 5 minutes' walk away. The individually decorated guest rooms at Unique Hotel feature original early 1900s details. There are private bathrooms in some rooms, and others share bathrooms in the corridor. Unique Hotel is right next to a small park, Tegnérlunden. The surrounding area has plenty of shops, bars and restaurants.

name: Hotell & Värdshuset Clas På Hörnet
description: This Stockholm hotel is located within a 10-minute stroll of Tekniska Hogskolan Metro Station. It also offers room service, free Wi-Fi and a 24-hour reception. The rooms are air conditioned and include tea and coffee making facilities, an iPod docking station and a private bathroom. There is also a flat-screen TV and a telephone. Serving European, French and regional dishes, Browallshof Hotell & Matsal's sophisticated restaurant provides a convenient dining option for those who wish dine on site. In the evening, guests can enjoy a drink in the cosy lounge bar. A wide selection of cafés and restaurants can also be found close by. Stockholm's attractions, including the Stockholm Public Library, are easily accessible on foot from Browallshof Hotell & Matsal. The surrounding neighbourhood is also well known for its shopping.Revato

name: Blique By Nobis
description: No description found

name: Reimersholme Hostel
description: Surrounded by water, charming architecture and green areas, this hotel is situated on Reimersholme Island in central Stockholm. Hornstull Metro Station is about 10 minutes’ walk away. Most rooms at Reimersholme Hostel have an armchair or sofa, while some also include a flat-screen TV. Bathroom facilities are either private or shared. Great food and snacks can be enjoyed in our in-house restaurant and wine bar. Breakfast is included for guests in the morning. We regularly play live music or have great DJ's in our Bar, and sometimes we have karaoke nights. Either way you will always have a great evening with us. In the summer we rent out stand-up paddle boards, and have Waydoo-courses. And if you feel like it, why not book our Sauna with friends for the night. Only 5 minutes’ walk away is the scenic island of Långholmen and its beautiful walking trails along the waterfront. Guests can take a swim in the water or rent a kayak here.

name: Aiden by Best Western Stockholm Kista
description: Aiden By Best Western Stockholm Kista is a modern and well-located hotel in the heart of Kista. With just a short walk to the headquarters of many major IT companies, Kista Science City, Science Tower, Kista Center, and Kistamassan (Kista Fair), the location is perfect for business travelers as well as visitors to the fair. The hotel has 117 rooms of various sizes, from single rooms for the budget-conscious to larger rooms with a mini-kitchen and dining table for long-term business travelers. The hotel offers free Wi-Fi, and each hotel room has its own access point as well as wired internet. All rooms at Aiden By Best Western Stockholm Kista feature stylish and modern design. The rooms have wooden floors, continental beds with enhanced sleeping comfort, and a TV with special features. The bathrooms have rain showers and hairdryers. Other facilities offered include indoor parking, luggage storage, and safes. You now also have the opportunity to get on/off the airport buses from Arlanda Airport that stop at Kistamassan. The hotel's bar is located in direct connection to the reception. Here, our guests have the opportunity to relax in a cool lounge environment with both modern and classic elements.bestwestern.com

name: Grad Hotel and Hostel
description: This hostel offers central budget accommodation with free WiFi access and a fully equipped shared kitchen. The Drottninggatan shopping street is 50 metres away, while Stockholm Central Station is within 15 minutes’ walk. All grad hotel and hostels rooms have shared bathroom facilities. The multilingual staff can help suggest restaurants, bars and shops in the surrounding area. Attractions such as the Old Town and the Royal Palace are 3 metro stops away. Rådmansgatan Metro Station is 3 minuets away from grad hotel and hostel.

name: Hostel Dalagatan
description: Located by Vasaparken Park, just 10 minutes' walk from Stockholm Central Station, this hostel offers brightly decorated rooms with air conditioning. Express check-in and check-out is featured. Odenplan Metro Station is a 4-minute walk away. The soundproofed rooms at Hostel Dalagatan have underfloor heating and either shared or private bathrooms. Guests can prepare their meals and watch TV in the fully equipped communal kitchen. WiFi is free in common areas. Drottninggatan shopping street is 500 metres from Dalagatan Hostel.

name: Hotel City Living
description: Set in the Stockholm suburb of Skarpnäck, this eco-friendly hotel offers free Wi-Fi and rooms with a flat-screen TV and shared bathroom facilities. Skarpnäck Metro Station is a 3-minute walk away. Guests can prepare meals in the fully equipped communal kitchen at Hotel City Living. Leisure facilities include a common room with seating areas, board games and a big-screen TV. Cafés, restaurants and grocery stores can be found by the metro station. Central Stockholm is a 20-minute metro ride from Hotel City Living.

name: Riddersviks Herrgård
description: Located on the shores of Lake Mälaren, this elegant manor features a large garden and a private boat jetty. Stockholm’s city centre is 25 minutes’ drive away. Dating back to 1762, Riddersviks Herrgård today offers modern rooms with free Wi-Fi, a TV and a writing desk. Traditional décor and garden views create a cosy atmosphere. Breakfast is served daily at Ridderviks Manor. A variety of restaurants as well as shops can be found at Hässelby Shopping Mall, a 10-minute walk away. Leisure options at Ridderviks Herrgård include billiards. In addition, the Viksjö Golf Course is 15 minutes’ drive away.

name: Ramilton Old Town Hostel
description: Situated in Stockholm, 600 metres from Museum of Medieval Stockholm, Ramilton Old Town Hostel provides express check-in and check-out and free WiFi. The property is close to several well-known attractions, 1.5 km from Stockholm City Hall, 1.7 km from Monteliusvägen and 1.7 km from Stureplan. The accommodation features a shared kitchen, a shared lounge and luggage storage for guests. At the hostel, all rooms have access to shared bathroom facilities with showers. As of February, we will renovate the bathroom and the shower room, so only the shower room will be available for both male and female guests. We are sorry for the inconvenience. Popular points of interest near Ramilton Old Town Hostel include The Royal Palace, Royal Swedish Opera and Stockholm Cathedral. The nearest airport is Bromma Stockholm Airport, 9 km from the accommodation.

name: City Hostel
description: Located in the Kungsholmen district, City Hostel offers accommodation in Stockholm. Stockholm Central Station and Stockholm City Hall are about a 10 minutes' walk away. Free WiFi and a flat-screen TV with cable channels is offered every room. Bed linen are provided. Guests can prepare meals in the shared kitchen. Several restaurants, bars and boutiques are within walking distance of City Hostel. Sergels Torg Square and Drottinggatan Shopping Street are about 1.2 km from City Hostel, while the Old Town is 1.7 km from the property. There is a bus stop within a few steps of the hostel's entrance.

name: Part-Time Home Rotebro Station
address: 8 Kung Hans väg, 192 68 Stockholm, Stockholms Lan
description: Rooms Make yourself at home in one of the 94 guestrooms, featuring kitchenettes with refrigerators and stovetops. Wired and wireless Internet access is complimentary, and Smart televisions with Netflix provide entertainment. Conveniences include separate sitting areas and microwaves, and housekeeping is provided weekly. Business}, Other Amenities Featured amenities include complimentary wired Internet access, express check-in, and laundry facilities. Self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite. Property Location With a stay at Part-Time Home Hotel Rotebro Station, you'll be centrally located in Sollentuna, within a 10-minute drive of Infra City and Kista Galleria. name: Hostel Bed & Breakfast
description: Just 10 metres from Rådmansgatan Metro Station, this family-run hostel is set in the Vasastan neighbourhood of central Stockholm. It offers free Wi-Fi, as well as free tea and coffee. Wooden furnishings and floral wallpaper decorate each room at Hostel Bed & Breakfast. There is also a TV in each room, and all have access to shared bathroom facilities. A communal kitchen with dining area and a TV lounge with books and board games are available for guests to use. Hostel B&B also has a daily breakfast buffet, a laundry room and bathroom toiletries for purchase. The nearby surroundings provide a wide selection of restaurants and nightlife options. Stockholm Central Station is a 3-minute Metro ride away.

name: Stf Zinkensdamm Hostel
description: This Stockholm hostel is in a quiet area by Tantolunden Park, in the vibrant district of Södermalm. It offers a restaurant, 2 communal kitchens, as well as free pasta and a free public internet computer. Guest rooms at Zinkensdamm Hostel have either a private bathroom or shared facilities. Rooms with bathrooms have cable TV. Zinkensdamm Hostel’s traditional Swedish breakfast buffet includes freshly baked bread. The in-house restaurant, Zinkadus Bar & Café, serves light dishes during the day and in the evening a dinner menu of Swedish specialities. Cold drinks and sandwiches are available at all times in the kiosk next to the reception. The nearby park has a mini golf course, plenty of open areas and a small sand beach. Shops, bars and restaurants are just around the corner. Hornstull Metro Station is about 5 minutes’ walk away.
